Job Title: Virtual Reality Game Developer

Location: Charlotte, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Do you thrive in a collaborative environment where you lead the development of innovative simulation features? Are you passionate about VR technology and its potential to revolutionize training? If so, then SimiGon wants to hear from you!
We're excited to announce that we're seeking a talented VR game developer to join our team! The ideal candidate will be a passionate and skilled individual with a proven track record in building immersive and engaging VR experiences. You'll be responsible for the entire content creation pipeline, from concept to implementation, ensuring our VR products are visually stunning, and deliver unforgettable gameplay. If you're a creative problem-solver who thrives in a collaborative environment and has a fire for pushing the boundaries of VR gaming, we want to hear from you!
SimiGon, a leading provider of advanced simulation and training technologies for the defense and aerospace industries, is seeking a talented VR Game Developer to join our growing team. In this role, you will play a key leadership role in developing content and updates for our simulation platforms using the SIMbox SDK.
Primary Roles and Responsibilities:Lead the development effort for assigned components and features, from design conception to final release.Develop content and updates for various simulation platforms using the SIMbox SDK.Collaborate closely with other developers and Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) to ensure technical accuracy and user experience.Demonstrate a high level of responsibility, self-accomplishment, commitment, dedication, focus, and productivity as part of a small, agile, and high-performing global team.Travel will be required to deployment sites or for team gatherings.
Required Competencies and Qualifications:Proven experience of at least 1-2 years with C++ programming language.Proven experience with Object-Oriented Design (OOD) principles and basic design patterns.Proven knowledge and experience with Agile development methodologies.Experience working with Windows development environments and IDEs.Experience using VR systems, including experience using VR games and applications (development experience on VR platforms is a plus).Preferred: Experience with game development engines like Unity or Unreal Engine.Preferred: Experience with C# programming language.
Benefits:Competitive salary and benefits package.Opportunity to work on challenging and impactful projects that contribute to national security training.Collaborative and fast-paced work environment.Be part of a team at the forefront of simulation technology.Opportunity to travel and experience different cultures (subject to company approval).
If you are a highly motivated and skilled Virtual Reality Game Developer with a passion for VR technology and a leadership mindset, then we encourage you to apply!

Experience Level (if available): None
